code: import classnames from'classnames';import*as React from'react';export const OrderTemplateLinesStatusMessage=(_ref)=>{let{className,errorType,text}=_ref;switch(errorType){case'EMPTY':return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:classnames('ms-order-template-lines__message-empty',className)},text);case'FAILED':return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:classnames('ms-order-template-lines__message-failed',className)},text);case'LOADING':default:return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:'ms-order-template-lines__message-waiting'},text);}};
